org.apache.sling.resource.filter

Interface ResourcePredicates

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ResourcePredicates.ResourcePredicateBuilder

    @ProviderType
public interface ResourcePredicates
    Service which provides the ability to convert a String into a Predicate to match against Resource Objects

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  ResourcePredicates.ResourcePredicateBuilder
      Provides a transitional state where multiple parameters can be applied before creating the Predicate

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.function.Predicate<Resource> parse(java.lang.String filter)
      Creates a Predicate based on the provided script
      java.util.function.Predicate<Resource> parse(java.lang.String filter, java.lang.String charEncoding)
      Creates a Predicate based on the provided script
      ResourcePredicates.ResourcePredicateBuilder usingParameterMap(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> params)
      Replaces the existing parameter map with the supplied Map object, all prior provided parameters will be replaced
      ResourcePredicates.ResourcePredicateBuilder withParameter(java.lang.String key, java.lang.Object value)
      Adds a key - value pair that can then be evaluated as part of the Predicate creation
      ResourcePredicates.ResourcePredicateBuilder withParameters(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> params)
      Add a series of key - value pairs that can then be evaluated as part of the Predicate creation
